metadata.title: CVE-2017-9832 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An integer overflow vulnerability in ptp-pack.c (ptp_unpack_OPL function)of libmtp (version 1.1.12 and below) allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds memory access) or maybe remote code execution byinserting a mobile device into a personal computer through a USB cable.

criterions.comment: libmtp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
